# @heroui/toast

Toast Component helps to provide feedback on user-actions.

## Installation

```sh
yarn add @heroui/toast
# or
npm i @heroui/toast
```

## Contribution

Yes please! See the
[contributing guidelines](https://github.com/heroui-inc/heroui/blob/canary/CONTRIBUTING.md)
for details.
